description:
After being chosen by a strange system, Yang Shan was thrown to another world and forced to be a worker.

The saddest thing was that, the system was not made to serve him, and instead, was made to serve the tormented thirsty wives. He was just merely a worker.

In order to earn enough points to return back to his world, Yang Shan has to do his best to satisfy those wives. Only when a wife’s happiness points reached 100, then would it be considered that he has successfully conquered a wife.

In the beginning, his targets were men. But gradually, intersexuals became his targets too…>
